text: Gaël Perdriau (born 8 July 1972) is a French politician, the current mayor of Saint-Étienne. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Saint-Étienne Category:People from Cholet Category:The Republicans (France) politicians Category:Politicians from Auvergne-Rhône- Alpes
title: Gaël Perdriau
